channel.title: Please help me on making admins and modifing skillz
channel.description:
Please help me I have had this trouble for a while. I want to make admin and mods but i cant.
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3289 character-posy = 3369 character-rights = 0 I try to modify rights right here character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20070525 character-energy = 5 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 347
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 1 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 0 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 0 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 0 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 20 4475 I try to modify player skillz here character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 1 0 character-skill = 3 17 3410 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 50 character-skill = 14 35 22536 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
After i am done modifing everything i press save logout and log back in and nothing happens. :confused: Could you explain in detail what I am doing wrong please?

item.title: Please help me on making admins and modifing skillz
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

modifie the player rights to player rights 2 not 3

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me on making admins and modifing skillz
item.dc:creator: @dawn_killer dawn killer
item.description:
@dawn_killer wrote:

I tried it its like my guy doesn’t logout properly. Everytime I go to log in it says I am already logged in and i have to try to log in 2 times. I also tried making a new account off of word pad and that didn’t work. I am fresh out of ideas and patience. [br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 08:13:14 AM[/size][hr]Heres what I exactly do… I log out then I exit out of compiler , after that I go to the charecters
file and change player rights from 0 to 3. I then press save than recompile log in and nothing has changed. [br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 08:31:37 AM[/size][hr]It might be nice for a reply

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me on making admins and modifing skillz

item.title: Please help me on making admins and modifing skillz
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

ok…for rights…1-mod,2-admin,3-owner,4-secret admin…and u have to save then compile…it should work then…for skills go into char files and edit the stat and exp…then compile

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me on making admins and modifing skillz
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

you’re saving before you log out lol … thats what you did wrong seeing as it will re write the file when you log out which means bye bye whatever you just changed … why not try logging out then changing and saving then logging in

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me on making admins and modifing skillz

item.title: Please help me on making admins and modifing skillz
item.dc:creator: @dawn_killer dawn killer
item.description:
@dawn_killer wrote:

Please help me I have had this trouble for a while. I want to make admin and mods but i cant.

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3289
character-posy = 3369
character-rights = 0 I try to modify rights right here
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20070525
character-energy = 5
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 347

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 -1 1
character-equip = 4 -1 0

character-equip = 6 0 0

character-equip = 8 0 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0

character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 20 4475 I try to modify player skillz here
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0
character-skill = 3 17 3410
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0

After i am done modifing everything i press save logout and log back in and nothing happens.
Could you explain in detail what I am doing wrong please?
